settings.hideLibThemerLoading.name: Hide Loading Screen
settings.hideLibThemerLoading.hint: When enabled, the loading screen will be hidden ASAP, instead of waiting for libThemer to finish.
settings.enableGoogleFonts.name: Enable Google Fonts
settings.enableGoogleFonts.hint: When enabled, you will be able to add google fonts from the Configure Additional Fonts setting. Please not that by adding a font from the Google Fonts API, Google will have access to your IP address. If you are uncomfortable with this, please don't use this feature or don't complain if you do.
settings.enableMasterTheme.name: Enable GM Theme
settings.enableMasterTheme.hint: When enabled, all connected players will recieve the Game Masters theme. This is useful if you want everyone to use the same theme.
settings.userStorage.name: Custom Theme Directory
settings.userStorage.hint: libThemer will attempt to load in any .theme files in this directory. Useful for custom themes without needing to make a whole module.

presets.createDefault.name: Enable Default Theme Presets
presets.createDefault.hint: This will add predefined theme presets to libThemer's Manage Presets menu.
presets.createDefault.label: Add Theme Presets
presets.createDefault.content: Would you like to add predefined theme presets to libThemer's Manage Presets Menu?

presets.overwritePreset: Update this preset with your current theme values?
presets.deletePreset: Are you sure you want to delete this Preset?

errors.noTitle: Please enter a Title for your Preset.

dialog.scriptreset.message: The setting you are disabling contains a javascript file. Javascript files can't be dynamically unloaded, so it is recommended that you reload your page now. Would you like to reload?

warning.stylesheet.name: Warning
warning.stylesheet.hint: This stylesheet is expiremental and may cause issues with systems or other modules. Please report any issues you come across

default.--palette-primary.name: Primary Color
default.--palette-primary.hint: The primary color is used throughout most of the UI, as the main color for your theme.
default.--palette-secondary.name: Secondary Color
default.--palette-secondary.hint: The secondary color is used for floating action buttons and other interactive elements, serving as visual contrast to the primary.
default.--palette-tertiary.name: Tertiary Color
default.--palette-tertiary.hint: The tertiary color is used for common buttons or repetitive elements that may not be important to the user.
default.--palette-quaternary.name: Quaternary Color
default.--palette-quaternary.hint: The quaternary color is used for common buttons or repetitive elements that may not be important to the user.
default.--palette-info.name: Info Color
default.--palette-info.hint: Info color is used to highlight additional or helpful information.
default.--palette-warning.name: Warning Color
default.--palette-warning.hint: Warning color is used to highlight content or events that may cause issues.
default.--palette-success.name: Success Color
default.--palette-success.hint: Success color is used to highlight content that has been completed successfully.
default.--palette-danger.name: Danger Color
default.--palette-danger.hint: Danger color is used to highlight content that has failed to complete.
default.--palette-light.name: Light Color
default.--palette-light.hint: The light color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be light.
default.--palette-dark.name: Dark Color
default.--palette-dark.hint: The dark color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be dark.
default.--palette-red.name: Red Color
default.--palette-red.hint: The red color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be red.

default.--palette-pink.hint: The pink color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be pink.

default.--palette-purple.hint: The purple color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be purple.

default.--palette-deep-purple.hint: The deep purple color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be deep purple.

default.--palette-indigo.hint: The indigo color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be indigo.

default.--palette-blue.hint: The blue color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be blue.

default.--palette-light-blue.hint: The light blue color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be light blue.
default.--palette-cyan.name: Cyan Color
default.--palette-cyan.hint: The cyan color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be cyan.

default.--palette-teal.hint: The teal color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be teal.

default.--palette-light-green.hint: The light green color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be light green.

default.--palette-lime.hint: The lime color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be lime.

default.--palette-yellow.hint: The yellow color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be yellow.

default.--palette-deep-orange.hint: The deep orange color is meant to be used to theme content you would like to be deep orange.

fvtt.--z-index-canvas.name: Canvas zIndex
fvtt.--z-index-canvas.hint: This changes the CSS zIndex of the Canvas. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.
fvtt.--z-index-app.name: App zIndex
fvtt.--z-index-app.hint: This changes the CSS zIndex of the App. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.
fvtt.--z-index-ui.name: UI zIndex
fvtt.--z-index-ui.hint: This changes the CSS zIndex of the UI. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.
fvtt.--z-index-window.name: Window zIndex
fvtt.--z-index-window.hint: This changes the CSS zIndex of Window. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.
fvtt.--z-index-tooltip.name: Tooltip zIndex
fvtt.--z-index-tooltip.hint: This changes the CSS zIndex of Tooltip. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.
fvtt.--sidebar-width.name: Sidebar Width
fvtt.--sidebar-width.hint: This will adjust the width of the sidebar in pixels.
fvtt.--sidebar-header-height.name: Sidebar Header Height
fvtt.--sidebar-header-height.hint: This will adjust the header height of the sidebar in pixels.
fvtt.--sidebar-item-height.name: Sidebar Item Height
fvtt.--sidebar-item-height.hint: This will adjust the item height of the sidebar in pixels.
fvtt.--hotbar-height.name: Hotbar Height
fvtt.--hotbar-height.hint: This will adjust the height of the hotbar in pixels.
fvtt.--hotbar-width.name: Hotbar Width
fvtt.--hotbar-width.hint: This will adjust the Width of the hotbar in pixels.
fvtt.--macro-size.name: Macro Size
fvtt.--macro-size.hint: This will adjust the size of the macro in pixels.
fvtt.--players-width.name: Players Width
fvtt.--players-width.hint: This will adjust the width of the players element in pixels.
fvtt.--form-field-height.name: Form Field Height
fvtt.--form-field-height.hint: This will adjust the height of the form field elements in pixels.
fvtt.--font-primary.name: Primary Font
fvtt.--font-primary.hint: This will change the primary font used within foundry.
fvtt.--font-mono.name: Monospace Font
fvtt.--font-mono.hint: This will change the monospace font used within foundry.
fvtt.--font-awesome.name: Icon Font
fvtt.--font-awesome.hint: This will change the font used for icons within foundry. It is highly recommended to not adjust this value unless you know what you are doing.

fvtt.--line-height-16.name: Line Height (16)
fvtt.--line-height-20.name: Line Height (20)
fvtt.--line-height-30.name: Line Height (30)

fvtt.--color-level-info.hint: Info color is used to highlight additional or helpful information.
fvtt.--color-level-warning.name: Info Color
fvtt.--color-level-warning.hint: Warning color is used to highlight content or events that may cause issues.
fvtt.--color-level-error.name: Info Color
fvtt.--color-level-error.hint: Danger color is used to highlight content that has failed to complete.

cssTidyHUD.name: Tidy HUD
cssTidyHUD.hint: This stylesheet attempts to tidy up / minify the HUD elements of foundry for a cleaner look.

cssTidyHUDDisableLogo.name: Hide Logo
cssTidyHUDDisableLogo.hint: This will hide the logo in the top left of the UI

cssTidyHUDControls.name: Adjust UI Controls
cssTidyHUDControls.hint: This allows you to change the size and position of the UI Controls.

cssTidyHUDSceneBrowser.name: Adjust UI Scene Browser
cssTidyHUDSceneBrowser.hint: This allows you to change the position of the UI Scene Browser.

cssTidyHUDPlayers.name: Minify Players UI
cssTidyHUDPlayers.hint: This will shrink the players UI to make it more compact

cssTidyHUDPlayersExpandOffline.name: Expand Player UI
cssTidyHUDPlayersExpandOffline.hint: The Player UI will expand to full width when showing offline players.

cssTidyHUDHotbar.name: Adjust UI Hotbar
cssTidyHUDHotbar.hint: This allows you to change the position of the UI Hotbar.

cssTidyHUDNotifications.name: Minify Notifications
cssTidyHUDNotifications.hint: This will make notifications appear more like a OS notification, but making them less wide and placing them next to the Sidebar.

tidyHUDControlsAlignment.name: Controls Alignment
tidyHUDControlsAlignment.hint: This allows you to adjust the alignment of the controls.

tidyHUDControlsMarginTop.name: Controls Margin Top
tidyHUDControlsMarginTop.hint: This allows you to adjust the controls spacing from the top.

tidyHUDControlsFontSize.name: Controls Font Size
tidyHUDControlsFontSize.hint: This allows you to adjust the font size of the main controls

tidyHUDControlsSize.name: Controls Size
tidyHUDControlsSize.hint: This allows you to adjust the size of the main controls

tidyHUDOffsetMarginTop.name: Scene Explorer Top Offset
tidyHUDOffsetMarginTop.hint: This allows you to adjust the controls spacing from the top.

tidyHUDOffsetMarginLeft.name: Scene Explorer Left Offset
tidyHUDOffsetMarginLeft.hint: This allows you to adjust the controls spacing from the left.

tidyHUDHotbarAlignment.name: Hotbar Alignment
tidyHUDHotbarAlignment.hint: This allows you to adjust the alignment of the hotbar.

tidyHUDHotbarOffset.name: Hotbar Offset
tidyHUDHotbarOffset.hint: This allows you to adjust the offset of the hotbar alignment.

cssTidySidebar.name: Tidy Sidebar
cssTidySidebar.hint: This stylesheet attempts to clean up the sidebar settings buttons in a way I personally perfer.

tidySidebarChat.name: Tidy Sidebar Chat
tidySidebarChat.hint: This setting will format the chat cards in a manner that I personally like inspired by Lukas from Discord.

borderRadius.name: Border Radius
borderRadius.hint: This setting controls the border radius of the chat cards.

zIndex.name: On Chat Message Hover z-index
zIndex.hint: When set to 1, the chat card will appear above the other chat cards when hovered. When set to 0, the chat card will remain the same.

tidySidebarPaddingY.name: Tidy Sidebar (Padding Y)
tidySidebarPaddingY.hint: This setting controls the spacing between the top/bottom of the button groups.

tidySidebarPaddingX.name: Tidy Sidebar (Padding X)
tidySidebarPaddingX.hint: This setting controls the spacing between the left/right of the button groups.

tidySidebarBorderRadius.name: Border Radius
tidySidebarBorderRadius.hint: This setting controls border radius of the first and last buttons in the button group.

cssfoundryVTTColors.name: Foundry Colorized
cssfoundryVTTColors.hint: This sheets attempts to use more colors to stylize the buttons and other elements of foundry.

cssfoundryVTTColorsWarning.name: Foundry Colorized Warning
cssfoundryVTTColorsWarning.hint: This stylesheet is expiremental and may cause issues with systems or other modules. Please report any issues you come across

settings.--app-background.name: App Background Color
settings.--app-background.hint: This styles the background color of the title bars and sidebar elements of foundry.
settings.--app-background-image.name: App Background Image
settings.--app-background-image.hint: This applies a background image to the title bar and sidebar elements of foundry.
settings.--app-dialog-background.name: Dialog Background Color
settings.--app-dialog-background.hint: This styles the background color of the dialogs and sheets in foundry.
settings.--app-dialog-background-image.name: App Background Image
settings.--app-dialog-background-image.hint: This applies a background image to the dialogs and sheets in foundry.

--primary.name: Primary Color
--primary.hint: This controls the primary color of the UI.

--secondary.name: Secondary Color
--secondary.hint: This controls the secondary color of the UI.

--tertiary.name: Tertiary Color
--tertiary.hint: This controls the tertiary color of the UI.

--alt.name: Alt Color
--alt.hint: This controls the alt color of the UI.

--bg.name: Background Color
--bg.hint: This controls the background color of the UI.

--sub.name: Sub Color
--sub.hint: This controls the sub color of the UI.

--color-disabled.name: Disabled Color
--color-disabled.hint: This controls the disabled color of the UI.

--inline-link-bg.name: Inline Link Background Color
--inline-link-bg.hint: This controls the inline link background color of the UI.

--inline-repost-bg.name: Inline Repost Background Color
--inline-repost-bg.hint: This controls the inline repost background color of the UI.

--visibility-gm-bg.name: GM Visibility Background Color
--visibility-gm-bg.hint: This controls the GM visibility background color of the UI.

--visibility-owner-bg.name: Owner Visibility Background Color
--visibility-owner-bg.hint: This controls the owner visibility background color of the UI.

--blind-roll.name: Blind Roll Color
--blind-roll.hint: This controls the blind roll color of the UI.

--light.name: Light Color
--light.hint: This controls the light color of the UI.

--dark.name: Dark Color
--dark.hint: This controls the dark color of the UI.

--color-text-trait.name: Trait Text Color
--color-text-trait.hint: This controls the trait text color of the UI.

--text-dark.name: Dark Text Color
--text-dark.hint: This controls the dark text color of the UI.

--text-light.name: Light Text Color
--text-light.hint: This controls the light text color of the UI.

--color-border-trait.name: Trait Border Color
--color-border-trait.hint: This controls the trait border color of the UI.

--color-border-divider.name: Divider Border Color
--color-border-divider.hint: This controls the divider border color of the UI.

cssPF2eDorakoUIFrostedGlass.name: Frosted Glass Effect
cssPF2eDorakoUIFrostedGlass.hint: This setting applies a frosted glass effect to the sheet background.

--frosted-glass-brightness.name: Brightness
--frosted-glass-brightness.hint: Applies a linear multiplier value on an HTMLElement, making the HTMLElement appear brighter or darker.

--frosted-glass-contrast.name: Contrast
--frosted-glass-contrast.hint: Adjusts the contrast of the HTMLElement.

--frosted-glass-blur.name: Blur
--frosted-glass-blur.hint: Applies a Gaussian blur to the HTMLElement.

--sheet-bg.name: Sheet Background Color
--sheet-bg.hint: DROP THIS SETTING: The Sheet Background Color to Use. WARNING: DO NOT CHANGE THIS UNLESS YOU REALLY WANT TO TINKER WITH ALOT OF SETTINGS. Use The DARK THEME IN PF2e Dorako UI Settings.

--sheet-sidebar-color.name: Sheet Sidebar Color
--sheet-sidebar-color.hint: The color of the sheet sidebar color.

--rarity-common.name: Common Rarity Color
--rarity-common.hint: The color of the common rarity.

--rarity-uncommon.name: Uncommon Rarity Color
--rarity-uncommon.hint: The color of the uncommon rarity.

--rarity-rare.name: Rare Rarity Color
--rarity-rare.hint: The color of the rare rarity.

--rarity-unique.name: Unique Rarity Color
--rarity-unique.hint: The color of the unique rarity.

--gold-brown.name: Gold Brown Color
--gold-brown.hint: The color of the gold brown.

--mats-dark.name: Dark Mats Color
--mats-dark.hint: The color of the dark mats.

--mats-gold.name: Gold Mats Color
--mats-gold.hint: The color of the gold mats.

--mats-green.name: Green Mats Color
--mats-green.hint: The color of the green mats.
